title: Help with graphics software.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i'm recently updating my graphics software after 1,217 days, i remember at the beginning of the year alot of players were getting banned and thought it was cause of the new AMD drivers. so I am wondering is it safe to play league on the shown software, ive had my account since 2012 really dont want to lose it unknowingly.

replies.body:
I've personally never seen  (nor heard stories of) anyone getting banned just because of AMD Drivers.   Maybe if there were problems with the drivers causing disconnections? But otherwise you should be fine.

If you do happen to run into game crashes or disconnections after updating the drivers, go ahead and send us a ticket and we'll help you out :D
i think the issue was with a new app they made that increased performance in game. it lowered ping while increasing fps.
